name: Burky
description:
Play as a mutated guinea pig escaping from a science lab!

Game created on GameJam at Spelkollektivet with the theme: "Elasticity - the ability of an object or material to resume its normal shape after being stretched or compressed; stretchiness."

Made by team Spiky Cuddles

Alex 'Xiphias' Andersson
Sofie 'Vanilj' Bresäter
Christian 'Jawsarn' Markowicz
Cecil Sigvard Eduardo Quiroga
